mapper.insert:
insert into re_bank_order_accept
bank_accept,
order_no,
org_id,
#{bankAccept,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{orderNo,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{orgId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
mapper.select: select count(1) from re_bank_order_accept a,re_user_order b where a.order_no = b.order_no and b.pay_status = 'Y' and a.bank_accept = #{bankAccept,jdbcType=BIGINT}
